KnowledgeBase.Title: isOdd
KnowledgeBase.RelatedFunctions: isPositive isZero isNull isExact isEven isNegative

Function.Description: The isOdd function determines if its argument {num} is an odd Integer.

Brief.Overview: The isOdd function determines if its argument {num} is an odd Integer.
Brief.Usage: The isOdd function determines if a number is an odd Integer.

Syntax.Return: Returns true if the object is Null (equal to #void), otherwise, false is returned otherwise
